title: GotemGTX
author: GotemGTX
created_time: November 16, 2022, 08:40:17 AMLast edit: November 18, 2022, 10:22:37 AM by GotemGTX
content: Gotem is a Decentralized crowdfunding & investigation platform solving rug pulls and scams. It’s running on Bsc chain. Bounty campaign  will be paid with LegioDAO tokens, trading on panacakeswap. https://www.dextools.io/app/en/bnb/pair-explorer/0xb12efcdbe1db6c7ae40411ec95d79cac3c81da4eBounty Campaign starts from  16th November, but voting for Gotem starts 19th November and will run for 3 days, You can Vote For Gotem  with multiple wallet addresses Pool now increased to $15,000. $5 per vote.Week 1: 16/11/2022 - 21/11/2022Total Pool: 3,200$ worth of $LGD tokenDistribution: 1 Month After Campaign Requirements: Register as Audience VoterAnyone who has crypto wallet and $Matic on Polygon can make votes. There are two options to register as a voter:On-site: You can invite your team members and friends to attend the 1st WAGMI Pitch Battle in person and to register as a voter at the venue before 14:00 on the final pitch date.Voting Period: 14:00 - 15:30, Nov. 19thOnline: There will be live streaming for the entire pitch battle on our Facebook Fanpage. People who want to vote for Gotem online need  register through this link. Registered voters will receive further instructions via email at 19:00 on Nov. 19th Sat.Voting Period: 19:00, Nov. 19th Sat. - 14:00 ,Nov. 21st Mon.Pool InformationVotting campaign - 100%This Campaign will be managed by Gotem  . To ask all the questions please join the Bounty group Gotem Rules To Vote 1. Must join Telegram   Telegram Chat2. For any kind of bounty issue only ask in Bounty Group  Bounty 3. Must Register First via this link  and wait for instructions on how to Vote on 19th November. (Vote for Gotem)4. Every one can Vote one time with each unique wallet addresses for Gotem but you will need to hold matic on each wallet to vote and each vote earns you an equivalent of $3 USDT. (Will be paid in LGD)    5.  Once you receive the email to vote on 19th November, you should proceed and Vote for Gotem. Ensure you complete all voting same day. 6.  Voting for Gotem is limited to the first 1100 votes from 19th November voting will commence. You have to fill the doc form after 19th November & upload prove of voting and prove of receiving the participation email.   Link to Register & wait for email to vote for Gotem. #PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: Forum Profile Link: Telegram Username: Participated Campaigns: BSC Wallet Address:
